Articles.Content:
Workaround Industries' home improvement division is here to offer you a great selection of furniture and other items for your home, whether it's on Kerbin or on Duna! Browse out catalogue:\

iKea Lawn Chair DinmfloTM

Admire your rocket launches from the comfort of the DinmfloTM Enhanced chair device! Now with built-in SpinnyVeelsTM

http://imgur.com/a/kwl6c

Ask for the download, get the download.

iKea Movie Theatre Set "Livrpast"

Perfect for a company get-together or personal use, the iKea Livrpast is elevated above the ground to prevent little kerblets from wandering in on a scary movie, such as the new thriller "Earth attacks!" Features special effects in the form of a small rocket engine and an ion 4D lamp, though you probably can't feel it.

 

Ask for the download, get the download. Also, I desperately need validation so give me some rep.

Leave a like if you enjoyed and a comment if you have any requests. I'm kind of sick of space atm, so I'll make whatever you want as long as I deem it appropriate.

 

 

 

 

 

Edited July 7, 2016 by The Optimist

LOL someone had fun making these!

 Very cute matey, and I am very happy they come pre-assembled!

1 hour ago, Majorjim said:

LOL someone had fun making these!

 Very cute matey, and I am very happy they come pre-assembled!

Lol...

 

I love stuff like this. Next time maybe take the shots during the day though. Looking at this on a phone is real difficult.

I absolutely love little things like this. Its not usefull for me, because i play Kerbal Space Program for building rockets and having fun. But sometimes, thing that dont really fit in the game, look funny and cute.
